statements: SELECT * FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE area_name = 'New York';
SELECT area_name, pollutant_type FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE pollutant_level > 50;
SELECT id, area_name, pollutant_type FROM air_quality_monitoring ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(pollutant_level) FROM air_quality_monitoring;
SELECT area_name, AVG(pollutant_level) AS avg_pollution_level FROM air_quality_monitoring GROUP BY area_name HAVING AVG(pollutant_level) > 30;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE area_name = 'City A' ORDER BY pollutant_level DESC;
SELECT area_name, AVG(pollutant_level) AS average_level FROM air_quality_monitoring GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT area_name, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE pollutant_level > 50 ORDER BY area_name ASC, pollutant_type DESC;
SELECT area_name, MAX(pollutant_level) AS max_level, MIN(pollutant_level) AS min_level FROM air_quality_monitoring GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT DISTINCT area_name FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE pollutant_type = 'CO2' AND pollutant_level < 30;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_monitoring;
SELECT id, area_name FROM air_quality_monitoring ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM city_areas WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT area_name, population, pollution_threshold FROM city_areas;
SELECT id, area_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE area_name = 'Downtown'
SELECT area_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY pollution_level DESC
SELECT * FROM city_areas WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT area_name, population, pollution_threshold FROM city_areas WHERE pollution_threshold BETWEEN 20.00 AND 30.00
SELECT id, area_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_monitoring WHERE pollution_level > (SELECT AVG(pollution_level) FROM air_quality_monitoring)
SELECT area_name, reading_value FROM AirQualityData
SELECT * FROM MonitoringStation WHERE station_type = 'Urban'
SELECT area_name, population FROM CityArea ORDER BY population DESC
SELECT AVG(reading_value) as avg_reading_value, pollutant_type FROM AirQualityData GROUP BY pollutant_type
SELECT station_name, station_type, station_location FROM MonitoringStation
SELECT a.area_name, b.pollutant_type, b.reading_value FROM CityArea a JOIN AirQualityData b ON a.area_name = b.area_name WHERE a.population > 10000 ORDER BY b.reading_value DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT a.area_name, b.pollutant_type, b.reading_value, b.reading_date FROM CityArea a JOIN AirQualityData b ON a.area_name = b.area_name WHERE b.pollutant_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY b.reading_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT a.area_name, c.station_name, c.station_type FROM CityArea a LEFT JOIN MonitoringStation c ON a.area_name = c.station_location WHERE c.station_type = 'Urban' ORDER BY a.area_name ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT c.station_name, a.area_name, a.pollution_level FROM MonitoringStation c RIGHT JOIN CityArea a ON c.station_location = a.area_name WHERE c.station_type = 'Rural' ORDER BY c.station_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT a.area_name, AVG(b.reading_value) AS avg_reading_value FROM CityArea a INNER JOIN AirQualityData b USING (area_name) GROUP BY a.area_name ORDER BY avg_reading_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM City;
SELECT city_name, city_id FROM City;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM Area WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityReading WHERE air_quality_index > 50;
SELECT reading_id, reading_date, air_quality_index FROM AirQualityReading ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT city_name FROM City
SELECT area_name, city_id FROM Area ORDER BY area_name DESC
SELECT reading_id, reading_date, air_quality_index FROM AirQualityReading WHERE air_quality_index > 100
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM Sensor WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT * FROM Area INNER JOIN City ON Area.city_id = City.city_id
SELECT * FROM City_Areas WHERE area_name = 'Downtown'
SELECT area_name, population FROM City_Areas WHERE population > 50000
SELECT * FROM Air_Quality_Reading ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT area_name, pm_25, pm_10, o3 FROM City_Areas JOIN Air_Quality_Reading ON City_Areas.area_id = Air_Quality_Reading.area_id
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM Air_Pollution_Sources
SELECT * FROM City_Areas ORDER BY population DESC, area_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT area_name, city_district FROM City_Areas WHERE population > 500000 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT area_name, population FROM City_Areas WHERE city_district = 'Downtown' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT reading_id, pm_25, pm_10, o3 FROM Air_Quality_Reading WHERE pm_25 > 20 AND o3 < 10 ORDER BY reading_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Air_Pollution_Sources WHERE source_type = 'Industrial' ORDER BY source_id ASC LIMIT 5;
